data.comment: The match has started, with Cercle Brugge kicking-off.
Vitinho is booked for the away team.
In the minute 43, Ike Ugbo puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Georges Mandjeck (Waasland-Beveren) has received a yellow card from Bram Van Driessche.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Waasland-Beveren with the kick-off.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a first substitution, with Danel Sinani replacing Georges Mandjeck.
Giulian Biancone (Cercle Brugge) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 63, The away team have replaced Leonardo da Silva Lopes with Thibo Somers. This is the first substitution made today by Paul Clement.
Cercle Brugge's Thibo Somers has been booked in Beveren.
Nicky Hayen is making the team's second substitution at Freethielstadion with Serge Leuko replacing Andreas Wiegel.
In the minute 75, Waasland-Beveren make their third substitution with Jordan Faucher replacing Joe Efford.
The away team replace Franck Kanoute with Johanna Omolo.
Goal! Ike Ugbo extends Cercle Brugge's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 84, Aleksandar Vukotic (Waasland-Beveren) has received a first yellow card.
Aleksandar Vukotic (Waasland-Beveren) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Charles Vanhoutte is replacing Anthony Musaba for the away team.
In the minute 86, Aboubakary Koita for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
